title: Harvard Database Hacked in Latest Ivy League Cyberattacks
description: A Harvard University database of alumni, donors, some students and faculty was accessed by “an unauthorized party” after a phone phishing attack, the latest cyberattack on Ivy League schools and the second time Harvard has investigated a breach this year.

title: Fannie, Freddie Shares Mimic Meme-Stock Mania With Wild Swings
description: Bill Ackman lit the fire and Bill Pulte supercharged it.

title: UAE Plans to Invest $1 Billion in African AI Infrastructure
description: The United Arab Emirates plans to invest $1 billion to expand artificial intelligence infrastructure and services across Africa, bolstering its influence on a continent that’s lagged behind the rest of the world in adopting the technology.
